sentence.Network_en: Please don't divagate from what we're discussing about! We don't need your political opinions.
sentence.Network_cn: 请别从我们所讨论的事岔开话题, 我们不需要你政治上的意见.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Wallonia的意思中文翻译 ... divacancy 双空位, 空位对 divagate 流浪, 漫游,离题 diurnation 昼间不活动之习性.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... ditch 沟，沟渠，壕沟 divagate 离题；飘泊 dotage 老年糊涂；溺爱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin divagat- 'wandered about', from the verb divagari, from di- 'widely' + vagari 'wander'

means.word_mean: 1. lose clarity or turn aside especially from the main subject of attention or course of argument in writing, thinking, or speaking;

sentences.sentence: "She always digresses when telling a story"
"Don't digress when you give a lecture"

sentences.en: He divagated into the field of literature.
sentences.cn: 他离题涉及到文学领域。
